channel.title: To Those who wish to release a server
channel.description:
Hello everyone. You may know that, sometimes releasing a server can be quite boring..Taking pictures uploading, typing, new picture uploading, typing, etc. Here is a program that I HAVE NOT MADE, but recommend for you guys to use. [url=http://code.google.com/p/zscreen/downloads/detail?name=ZUploader-5.0.0.2971-setup.exe&can=2&q=]http://code.google.com/p/zscreen/downloads/detail?name=ZUploader-5.0.0.2971-setup.exe&can=2&q=[/url] ZUploader is a program that takes pictures of your screen and automatically uploads it onto imagehosting sites such as Imageshack.
[img]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/2586/20120125145327.png[/img]
It's userful when our taking pictures of your server, when releasing it. :)

item.title: To Those who wish to release a server
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:19, topic:430539”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=533220.msg3897738#msg3897738 date=1327460232]
He’s just trying to help out the community. No need to be mean.
[/quote]
+1
I don’t understand why people are flaming this. Are yous all idiots(aimed at the trolls) DO YOUS EVEN KNOW WHAT TECHNOLOGY WAS ORIGINALLY MADE FOR? Let me tell you, it was made to make life easier. Remember the first printed book, why was it made? So that monks(?) didn’t have to write the bible(?). Fucking retarded people.

Ontopic: This just doesn’t affect people that are releasing servers:P. Wont be using this but thanks for posting it.[/quote]
Things like this being made to make life easier is true, but we also don’t need one click server advertisement programs that would branch off this, proving that you’re really that lazy and that your server probably is half-assed.

Read full topic

[/quote] What is by hand?[/quote]By hand the good ol’ fashion way is more fun then just “BOOM, SCREENSHOT. Upload… :(”
